DOC.detailed_description: In prospective , randomize , control trial , patient bear 32 week gestational age and/or birth weight 1500 g admit tertiary neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) University Hospitals Leuven within 24 hour birth , eligible inclusion study except infant die within first 24 hour . Infants whose mother intend breastfeed randomly assign , use digital system , receive either raw pasteurize mother 's milk . The duration study birth eight week age discharge NICU , whichever occur first . The need ensure proper handle milk precludes true blind caregiver . The institutional review board approve study write informed parental consent i obtain enrolment .
